page.title: 03AFTER SCHOOL
page.content: When I get home each afternoon from school I go and see if my fowls have laid any eggs; usually we have 4 eggs from 6 fowls. Then I go and get changed and do some homework. After I've done some homework I go and get out my B.M.X. (a B.M.X. is a bicycle used for stunts). Then I call for a friend and see if he is coming out on his B.M.X. Sometimes we go and call for another friend and we go down the lanes. Down one of the lanes is a really steep hill and if we get a good run up, we go really fast down the hill. Sometimes we find rusty horse- shoes. At half past five I go home to have some tea. After tea I usually stay inside until I go to bed. At seven o'clock I go and feed our cats. At eight o'clock I go and feed my fowls.
